Ask HN: Why is BuildZoom always hiring a principal engineer?
text: Is this principal engineer the head of a new division? Replacing the old one? A "senior" engineer but with title inflation? "Principal" implies that there's only one position to fill, so it's curious that this particular job ad is so common.

Show HN: I wrote a book about overcoming the Metacrisis
text:
Hey HN!

Recently published a book developing new frameworks of meaning and value informed by our most advanced cosmology and physics. It makes the argument for the necessity of spiritual revolution in order to free the abundance trapped in the world, a reimagination that interlinks the spiritual project to systemic reformation.

The inspiration for the text draws from my history of social impact work and the frustrations and lessons learned along the way.

If it's of interest you can learn more/read it/download it in a variety of formats for free at https://singletruth.org.

Tell HN: Russian antivirus flags NPM package as malicious for logged message
text:
The popular npm package es5-shim checks location on install and logs a Russian call for peace for Russian users.

Kaspersky (Russian AV) flags this file as a virus.

https://github.com/medikoo/es5-ext/blob/main/_postinstall.js

Ask HN: What is lacking from modern computer science undergrad curriculum?
text:
What do you think should be included in most computer science curriculums so that CS degrees produce more well rounded engineers with strong grounding in both the practical and theory.

To me, there should be at least one course where students are given moderate sized codebases and asked to understand it and add some features to it, or maybe debug a broken part.

Show HN: Open-Source Enterprise SSO with Support for OpenID Connect and SAML
text:
Hi, I'm currently working as a dev on the BoxyHQ team, providing an OSS platform for devs to quickly plug-n-play enterprise features into their products.

Jackson is one of our core offerings which enables SSO integration for your SaaS apps. We had support for SAML Identity Providers from day one.

Today, I am excited to share that we now support OpenID Connect Providers also. With this change, we hope to cover almost all the SSO use cases out there. It would be great to get your feedback, please reach out to me at aswin@boxyhq.com

Read more about it in our blog post: https://boxyhq.com/blog/sso-building-blocks
